mapper.select: SELECT B.BOOK_CODE as bookCode, TITLE as title, PUBLISHER as publisher, PRICE as price, PAGES as pages, DESCRIPTION as description, STATUS as status, AUTHOR as author, CREATED_YEAR as createdYear, CATEGORY as category, IMG as img FROM GIOHANG G JOIN DAUSACH B ON G.BOOK_CODE = B.BOOK_CODE WHERE G.USER_UID = #{userUid};
